verses.verse: וימלך <WH4427> reigned יהושׁפט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat בנו <WH1121> his son תחתיו <WH8478> in his stead, ויתחזק <WH2388> and strengthened himself על <WH5921> against ישׂראל׃ <WH3478> Israel.
